name: arch::boot::multiboot2::parse_framebuffer_info

multiboot2::BootInformation::<'a>::frame.doc:
Search for the [`FramebufferTag`]. The result is `Some(Err(e))`, if the
 framebuffer type is unknown, while the framebuffer tag is present.

multiboot2::FramebufferTag::address.doc:
Contains framebuffer physical address.

 This field is 64-bit wide but bootloader should set it under 4GiB if
 possible for compatibility with payloads which arenâ€™t aware of PAE or
 amd64.

multiboot2::FramebufferTag::bpp.doc: Contains number of bits per pixel.
